title: Homer is awesome...
body: <!-- id=261--><!-- isMature=0 --><B>Reporter:</B> Uh, question for the barbeque chef.  Don't you think there is an inherent danger in sending underqualified civilians into space?<BR><B>Homer:</B> I'll field this one.  The only danger is if they send us to [ominous] that terrible Planet of the Apes.  Wait a minute... Statue of Liberty...that was _our_ planet!  You maniacs!  You blew it up!  Damn you!  Damn you all to hell!  [weeps]<BR><B>Barney:</B> [burps] Oh -- [falls over]<BR><B>Scientist:</B> Thank you, that's all we have time for.<BR>-- <A HREF="http://www.snpp.com/episodes/1F13.html">The NASA press conference, "Deep Space Homer</A>
bodyArticleHtml:
2003-10-31

Homer is awesome...

Reporter: Uh, question for the barbeque chef. Don't you think there is an inherent danger in sending underqualified civilians into space?
Homer: I'll field this one. The only danger is if they send us to [ominous] that terrible Planet of the Apes. Wait a minute... Statue of Liberty...that was _our_ planet! You maniacs! You blew it up! Damn you! Damn you all to hell! [weeps]
Barney: [burps] Oh -- [falls over]
Scientist: Thank you, that's all we have time for.
--
